dhyānāni ca upasaṃpadya prīti saukhya samanvitāḥ
brahmacaryan cariṣyanti maitreyasya anuśāsane
sahasrāṇi maitreyaḥ dvipada uttamaḥ
deśayiṣyati saddharmam śāstā loka anukampayā

original: śatāni ca sahasrāṇi prāṇiṇāṃ sa vināyakaḥ /
analyzed: śatāni ca sahasrāṇi prāṇiṇām sa vināyakaḥ
vinīya dharmakāyena tatas nirvāṇam eṣyati
tasmin ca nirvṛte dhīre maitreye dvipada uttame
daśa varṣa sahasrāṇi saddharmam sthāsyati kṣitau
prasādayati cittāni tasmāt śākyamunau jine
tatas udṛkṣatha maitreyam saṃbuddham dvipada uttamam

original: tasmāddharme ca buddhe ca saṃghe cāpi gaṇottame /
analyzed: tasmāt dharme ca buddhe ca saṃghe ca api gaṇa uttame
prasādayati cittāni bhaviṣyati maharddhikam
tam tādṛśam kāruṇikam maitreyam dvipada uttamam
ārādhayitvā kālena tatas nirvāṇam eṣyatha
idam āścaryakam śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca vibhava analpikām

original: ko vidvānna prasīdeta api kṛṣṇāsu jātiṣu // Mvyā_107 //
analyzed: kaḥ vidvān na prasīdeta api kṛṣṇāsu jātiṣu
tasmāt iha ātma kāmena māhātmayam abhikāṃkṣatāḥ
saddharmaḥ gurukarttavyaḥ smaratā buddha śāsanam
maitreya vyākaraṇam samāptam
